title: And I Saw in the Right Hand of Him That Sat on the Throne a Book Written Within and on the Backside, Sealed with Seven Seals (Puis je vis, dans la main droite de celui qui était assis sur le trône, un livre écrit dedans et dehors, scellé de sept sceaux) from Apocalypse of Saint John (Apocalypse de Saint-Jean)
medium: Lithograph with chine collé from a portfolio of 13 lithographs (12 with chine collé)
credits: Gift of The Ian Woodner Family Collection
